byline.contributor: Michael Wines contributed reporting from Beijing.

abstract: United States Defense Sec Leon E Panetta makes his first visit to Japan; addresses fears over US budget debate and says that the US will strengthen its presence in the Pacific despite cuts.
snippet: With allies worried about China’s military, Defense Secretary Leon E. Panetta said the United States would strengthen its Pacific presence.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces

lead_paragraph: With allies worried about China’s military, Defense Secretary Leon E. Panetta said the United States would strengthen its Pacific presence.

headline.main: U.S. Pivots Eastward to Address Uneasy Allies
headline.print_headline: U.S. Pivots Eastward To Address Uneasy Allies
headline.seo: Leon Panetta Assures Allies of U.S. Presence in Pacific
